DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare outcomes quality-of-life measure evaluate body image cosmesis Single Incision Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy ( SILC ) Conventional Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy ( CLC ) .Twenty eight patient underwent SILC 30 underwent LC.Fifty-eight patient include study divide two group . The result questionnaires statistically compare .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Single İncision Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Versus Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Recently , single incision laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( SILC ) one minimally invasive technique , develop reduce need multiple port become popular among surgeon . This study conduct fifty eight patient January 2011 March 2013 Turkey . Fifty-eight patient include study divide two group . Quality-of-life measure evaluate EuroQol EQ-5D questionnaire.Cosmesis body image evaluate Body Image Questionnaire . All statistical analysis perform IBM Statistics 21.0 MS-Excel 2007 . A value p < 0.05 accept statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: The patient schedule elective cholecystectomy include study pregnancy acute cholecystitis ASA 34 ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) history bile duct stone migration biller pancreatitis upper laparatomy ventral hernia repair chronic systemic disease allergic attitude agent
